attributes.action: call an immediate emergency budget for the good of the country not for the good of one political party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like an immediate emergency budget to address the financial mess that will become our legacy to our children if we're not careful.  The pre-budget report was totally politically motivated and it is unacceptable.  I'd actually be more likely to vote labour if they were honest with us about the problems rather than trying to defer the problems until after the next general election.
